content.value: Bogotá Real is located in a residential neighborhood in north Bogotá, just 2 blocks from Transmilenio transport system. It offers accommodation with cable TV, a garden and free Wi-Fi.
The rooms at Hostal Bogotá Real feature a modern decor. They have private bathrooms with showers. Room service is available 24/7.
Restaurants and bars are within a short walk for breakfast, dinner and entertainment options.
From Bogotá Real Hostal, guests have easy access to shopping malls, 93 Park and Zona Rosa. The Airport is a 15 minutes’ drive. Free parking is possible when arriving by car at the hotel.

description.description: Hostel Bogota Real, the best hostel in Bogota, welcomes you! We opened this year, guarantee you will find.. Hostal Bogota Real is located in the north of the city. Hostel Bogota Real" guarantees you will find facilities and services according to your expectations. "Hostel Bogota Real" is a business that offers a customized and polite treatment to all its customers. Its easy access and excellent location, the comfort of its rooms, as well as the courtesy of its employees will make you feel as you were at home.
